W3C Verifiable Credentials

India's trust layer for education credentials.

Issue tamper‑proof degrees, store them in student wallets, and verify in seconds—QR or API. Built on open standards (DID + VC), with zk‑proofs and PoP integrations.

Compliant with W3C VC Selective disclosure (SD‑JWT‑VC) Optional PoP: Worldcoin / Aadhaar

Product Suite

Everything you need to issue, store, and verify.

Built for universities, edtechs, and high‑volume recruiters.

Issuer Dashboard

Issue VCs, manage schemas, revoke, and export analytics. Domain proof with did:web.

  • Role‑based access
  • Schema templates
  • Revocation registry
Student Wallet

Own your credentials. Share via QR or link. Prove selectively with SD‑JWT‑VC.

  • Self‑custody
  • Multi‑DID support
  • zk‑proof flows
Recruiter Verify

Scan. Verify. Integrate into ATS via API. Sub‑2s verification at scale.

  • Embed widget
  • Webhooks
  • Audit trail
